Podcast Addict

Brief: Podcast Addict is the ultimate companion for any podcast enthusiast, offering a vast universe of over 5 million podcasts and 100 million-plus episodes. This versatile app features powerful search capabilities, seamless playback, and audio effects, guiding you through an expansive audible journey from news and education to entertainment podcasts.

Core Features:

  • Search and Discovery: Explore podcasts by name, keywords, or category with custom recommendations üìå
  • Advanced Playback: Enjoy audio effects, variable speed, shuffle, loop mode and sleep timer for audio and video üìå
  • Automation: Schedule downloads, updates, and automatic deletions for a personalized podcast experience üìå
  • Multi-device Support: Integrated with Chromecast, SONOS, Android Auto, and more for flexible listening üìå
  • Backup and Restoration: Secure your subscriptions with automatic cloud backup and OPML file import/export üìå

  • Versatility: Manage live radio streams, bookmarks, notes, and SD card storage üëç
  • Accessibility: Offers a user-friendly interface, full screen reading mode, and accessibility features üëç
